name: Arcanum Knights
description:
When did the ancient city of Arcanam, which boasts a long history, begin to be eroded by a curse similar to a strange disease?

It was noticed that the erosion was brought about by those who lived in the spiritual space "Astral" that exists next to this world.

It was after the town had already lost its vibrancy and glory, and the ancient city was filled with despair and malaise.

Those in the ancient city, who lost the power to pick up their swords themselves, sought salvation from outsiders.

Promise the rewards you want and the status you want for those who have overcome this plight.

Soon, rumors of the ancient city of Arcanam spread throughout the continent.

Those who think of great rewards,

Those who seek the wisdom of the astral world, which was thought to be a legend,

Those who seek the hardships and battlefields to train themselves,

Various people gather in the ancient city of Arcanam, which has been eroded by the curse, with their own purposes in mind.

At that time, this story begins when a man arrives at the ancient city.
